jd: From: Gaurav Tomar, Arkaya Infotech Inc. gaurav@arkayainfotech.com Reply to: gaurav@arkayainfotech.com Role : AWS Cloud DBA Location : Jersey City, NJ Hybrid Locals Visa : GC or USC MOI : Virtual LinkedIn*** MUST Have Investment Banking and Market Data environment experience*** Team is currently looking for a AWS Cloud DBA with experience doing DevOps. Cloud Database RDS 2-3 years of experience with AWS Databases • Experience in migrating data from on-prem to RDS and S3 Exceptional knowledge of AWS Console, AWS CLI S3, DMS ◦ RDS: Postgres, MySQL, Aurora Postgres and NoSQL (MongoDB) Cloud Watch • Good knowledge of ◦ AWS SDK e RedShift ◦ Snowflake O Redis ○ High Availability and disaster recovery ◦ MSKI Streaming/Messaging Architectures AWS IAM and integration with AWS Identity Center ○ Service Resiliency - HADR designs/solutions tied to business tiering - replication across AZs and Regions e ETL Tools/MWAA Airflow AWS Glue EKS/ECR • Knowledge of ◦ Non-relational AWS databases: DynamoDB, Document DB, Neptune, OpenSearch ◦ Load balancing • Nice to have Experience in migrating data from on-prem into Snowflake, RedShift Automation/DevOps Experience • Exceptional knowledge of: ○ Python, Terraform, Cloud Formation Lambda Enterprise level Application Integration experience on AWS Experience with ◦ Automation and monitoring within AWS ○ Continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) • Ability to automate migration of data to RDS, S3, Snowflake, Redshift Interpersonal Required Skills Ability to think about a problem identify what we have and implement: solutions to solve the problem independently Strong verbal and written communication skills Ability to think in and out of the box. Self-learner. Self-motivated, conscientious dedicated individual who works equally well independently or as a member of a team • Must be willing to take responsibility and ownership instead of waiting to be assigned work. Must be willing to participate in follow the sun support The candidate must be willing to provide weekend support, The support is rotated among DBAs in US, London, and India Regards, Gaurav Tomar Lead IT Recruiter Arkaya Infotech Inc.
